text: Mae Louise Suggs (September 7, 1923 â€“ August 6, 2015) was an American professional golfer. She was one of the founders of the LPGA Tour. She was born in Atlanta, Georgia. Suggs died in Sarasota, Florida at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Georgia Sports Hall of Fame *Louise Suggs biography at About.com Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from Atlanta
